title: [Rant]What is thatGE healthcare shortlist
content:
Seriously bruh, how does a company filter half of it's shortlist in one hirevue round, and what even is it based on?

Placements are scam in broad daylight. Nothing meaningful ever matters in this bullshit roulette.

comments.body: Wait did they share the shortlist for GE Healthcare ? I thought the test is not over !
This was for 3rd year guys - had the hirevue interview 5th sept

Usually over 85% of people get shortlisted in the OA,there’s a variety of factors not including your score such as GPA,resume,10th,12th.

Get used to it,you’ll see 400 people writing the test to 15 people getting shortlisted for interview
Yeah i understand, I've had people with the exact same scores in 10th, 12th and most other things qualify many times as well. I guess luck's not on my side yet
Did the short list come out? I didn’t get anything
This was for 3rd years, the list for 4th years is yet to come out ig
What was the shortlisting criteria for 3rd year 10th 12th and CGPA ?
They didn't mention anything officially, but most of them happen to have 10th and 12th of around 90% or higher, and cgpa of 8.5ish+ with very few being above 9.
bro where are u getting 8.5 cgpa number from.....all shortlists till now had all gpa ranges....
Many from the list are hovering around 8.5, 8.8's. From what I saw, I could only spot one or two in like 7.6. There doesn't seem to be a set trend with cgpa's
